sentences.sContent: A kite is a quadrilateral with one line of symmetry.
sentences.sContent_eng: A kite is a quadrilateral with one line of symmetry.
sentences.sCn: 风筝是个有一条对称线的四边形。

sentences.sContent: Based on geometrical nonlinear finite element theory, a curved quadrilateral isoperimetric element with 8 nodes for initial form analysis of tensile membrane structures is presented.
sentences.sContent_eng: Based on geometrical nonlinear finite element theory, a curved quadrilateral isoperimetric element with 8 nodes for initial form analysis of tensile membrane structures is presented.
sentences.sCn: 根据几何非线性有限元理论，提出张力膜结构初始形态分析的8结点曲面四边形等参单元。

sentences.sContent: Based on the geometrical nonlinear finite element (GNFE) theory, a curved quadrilateral isoperimetric element with 8 nodes for initial form analysis of tensile membrane structures is presented.
sentences.sContent_eng: Based on the geometrical nonlinear finite element (GNFE) theory, a curved quadrilateral isoperimetric element with 8 nodes for initial form analysis of tensile membrane structures is presented.
sentences.sCn: 本文根据几何非线性有限元理论，提出张力膜结构初始形态分析的8结点曲面四边形等参单元。

trans.tranOther: a flat shape with four straight sides
